select oritb.company_cd /* 업체코드 */ , '' as mtart , db159_1.PRD_GRP_NM as prdgrp_nm , oritb.material_num , maintb.supply_qty , '1000' supply_place , maintb.supply_dt /* 남품일자 */
from tb_orderfor oritb inner join tb_shipping maintb on oritb.orderfor_key = maintb.orderfor_key left outer join ERP_DL.WJP.wjp.MARA saptb3 on oritb.material_num = saptb3.MATNR COLLATE Korean_Wansung_CI_AS left outer join [192.9.200.159].IMES.dbo.WMAS_PRD_GRP db159_1 on saptb3.SPART COLLATE Korean_Wansung_CI_AS = db159_1.PRD_GRP_CD WHERE maintb.SHIPPING_SEQ > 0 and maintb.supply_dt = CONVERT(CHAR(10), getdate(), 102) and maintb.process_cd = 'ST_CFM' order by oritb.company_cd , db159_1.PRD_GRP_NM , maintb.supply_dt

SELECT company_cd , '' as mtart , prdgrp_nm , 'ZORM' as ordertype , '4600' as ordercorp , '20' as orderpath , '00' as ordergroup , NUM + 1 as srow , count(*) as cnt , supply_dt , ppno , '' as docnum , '' as supply_num
FROM ( select oritb.company_cd /* 업체코드 */ , db159_1.PRD_GRP_NM as prdgrp_nm , oritb.material_num , maintb.supply_qty , '1000' supply_place , maintb.supply_dt /* 남품일자 */ , concat(plc.place_nm,'-',maintb.shipping_method) as ppno , RANK() OVER( ORDER BY oritb.company_cd, concat(plc.place_nm,'-',maintb.shipping_method) , db159_1.PRD_GRP_NM, maintb.supply_dt ) AS NUM from tb_orderfor oritb inner join tb_shipping maintb on oritb.orderfor_key = maintb.orderfor_key left outer join tb_place plc on oritb.place_key = plc.place_key left outer join ERP_DL.WJP.wjp.MARA saptb3 on oritb.material_num = saptb3.MATNR COLLATE Korean_Wansung_CI_AS left outer join [192.9.200.159].IMES.dbo.WMAS_PRD_GRP db159_1 on saptb3.SPART COLLATE Korean_Wansung_CI_AS = db159_1.PRD_GRP_CD WHERE maintb.SHIPPING_SEQ > 0 and maintb.supply_dt = CONVERT(CHAR(10), getdate(), 102) and maintb.process_cd = 'ST_CFM' ) tot group by company_cd , ppno , prdgrp_nm , supply_dt , NUM
order by company_cd , ppno , prdgrp_nm , supply_dt , NUM
